_comments.opcua_server_url: URL of the OPC UA server to mirror (e.g., opc.tcp://192.168.0.1:53530/OPCUA/Server). Include the full path.
_comments.udp_host: UDP destination host (127.0.0.1 for localhost, or IP of receiver)
_comments.udp_port: UDP destination port (must match receiver's udp_port)
_comments.subscription_interval: OPC UA subscription interval in milliseconds. Default: 100
_comments.structure_check_interval: How often (in seconds) to check for structure changes. Default: 30

compression.enabled: Enable/disable UDP packet compression. Default: false
compression.method: Compression method: 'zlib' (built-in, balanced) or 'lz4' (fastest, requires python-lz4). Default: zlib
compression.level: Compression level for zlib: 1 (fastest) to 9 (best compression). Default: 6 (balanced)

encryption.enabled: Enable/disable UDP packet encryption. Default: false
encryption.algorithm: Encryption algorithm: 'aes-128-gcm' (fast, secure), 'aes-256-gcm' (slower, more secure - RECOMMENDED), 'chacha20-poly1305' (fastest, modern). All use authenticated encryption (AEAD) with built-in integrity protection. Default: aes-256-gcm
encryption.key: Encryption key (base64 string, 32 bytes for aes-256-gcm/chacha20, 16 bytes for aes-128-gcm). Generate with: python3 -c 'import os, base64; print(base64.b64encode(os.urandom(32)).decode())'. Both sender and receiver must use the same key and algorithm.
